issue.title: [C++] Temporal floor/ceil/round handle ambiguous/nonexistent local time
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15251](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15251). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-14822 enables temporal round/floor/ceil and raises on ambiguous/nonexistent local time. We should allow users to choose different behaviours e.g.: raise, earliest, latest, etc.
See AssumeTimezoneOptions for example.
